20110112015928.000|20110112015930.000|CC1|HELP AND IT WAS ACUTE           
20110112015930.000|20110112015931.000|CC1|PROPOFOL INTOXICATION WITH      
20110112015931.000|20110112015937.000|CC1|OTHER MUSCLE RELAX ANTS         
20110112015937.000|20110112015940.000|CC1|THAT CAUSED MICHAEL JACKSON
